content: I think I'll use a dedicated journal for my gratitude habit. I like the idea of having a physical book where I can write down my thoughts and reflect on them later. By the way, speaking of reflection, I've been thinking about my social media break back in February. I took a 10-day break, from February 15th to 25th, and it really helped me reset my online habits. Do you have any tips on how to maintain a healthy online presence without getting sucked back into the vortex of endless scrolling?
